author: Staff Reporter
text:
Shiv Sena members staged a protest at Golden Nagar in the city on Wednesday alleging that poor hygiene and sanitation resulted in many people being affected with viral diseases.

Sena’s district president K.V. Saravanan said that the corporation administration was lethargic in taking steps to prevent outbreak of diseases.

He also blamed that a girl with suspected dengue in the area was not given proper treatment at District Headquarters hospital.

“We will intensify agitation if proper steps are not taken by the authorities concerned to control mosquitoes, which spread viral diseases”, he added.
title: Shiv Sena stages protest
